storyInfo:
At first glance, Mephisto appears to be cornered. But with just a few words, the entire situation is turned on its head.
Despite the sudden shift in fortunes, Ch'en still has a back-up planâ€”

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You're no match for me!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You defeated all my comrades single-handedly? Perhaps I must re-evaluate your abilities, Madam.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: That's enough.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, far from it. Faust, give her a shake-down.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Those on the roof, get down!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ahh!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Reunion's sniper...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (I even made sure to prepare for ranged attacks, but how does he pack this much firepower...?)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's not enough to save your life. You'll die before your sniper can land a shot on me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Wait. Were you arrested by the L.G.D. before?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Your bunch caused him a great deal of grief. But it's nothing compared to what Ursus did to us.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: He missed that shot on purpose, dear Madam. We'll spare your life this once, so take this as a gesture of kindness.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Right now, the seeds of unrest have been sown within the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It was your organization's corruption and negligence that gave him the chance to cooperate with us.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: ...Reunion scum, you know nothing about this world.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Were you trying to say something profound?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Did you think that Faust was rescued by Reunion?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There were many Infected in the L.G.D. at the time.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Twenty-one.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Did you think that at least four of them would side with Reunion?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But even those four were set up by me. After they got in contact with you, did you lock one of them up?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Very clever, Madam. She ran away.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Have you still not realized the situation you're now in?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course I've figured it out. My squad has been crushed, and I'm the only one left.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Our forces wandering around outside are hopelessly weak, and my comrades have basically lost their will to fight.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Is this what you wanted to hear me say?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I suppose you're not that arrogant after all.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well then... Come, my guards.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Rise.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Ugh... argh... Ooaarrrggh!!!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: What did you do?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The bits of Originium on their bodies... are growing?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The Originium will pierce through their bodies and become their new form.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Behold, Officer. These are my guards, my immortal guards.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: GRAAAAAAGHHH!!
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: Take it all, my herd, my comrades...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Fwoo...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Powder...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: My comrades need healing. They need me.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Arts? All squads, be on alert! The enemy commander is casting wide-range Arts using some kind of powder!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't worry, Madam. This does not concern you, as you are not my comrade.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Ugh... Aagghhâ€”
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ...Unghh... Nnngh!
attributes.name: ReUni N MemBr

attributes.content: Nghhhaaahghh...
attributes.name: ReUMmbr? N;E? OE

attributes.content: Grrraaaaaaaaaaaghh!
...Blood!! Blood!! Aaaargh!!! Aaaaaggh!!!
attributes.name: Mephisto's hERd

attributes.content: Quiet now.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en, it's looking bad...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: All the defeated Reunion members started to transform into hulking monstrosities after coming in contact with that powder!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: They've started attacking us again, and they're slowly moving towards our defense line!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Just how many of them have transformed?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: All of them!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: They are my herd, as well as my brethren.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: ...Urgh.
attributes.name: Mephisto's Herd

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They shall never fall, because I will take away all their pain.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You're just manipulating them like puppets. How can you call them your brethren?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I see no difference between the two. For the greater good, we are willing to become anything.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If this is what you call the greater good... Looks like you're the only one I need to get rid of.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You have a sense of purpose, and the will to get it done. I'm quite drawn to you, Madam.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Focus your fire! Hurry! Aim at the enemy commander!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Urrrrgghhhh...
attributes.name: Mephisto's Guard

attributes.content: But you'll find that my guards are not so easily defeated.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: They just blocked the explosion with their flesh... and they're completely unscathed?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: That amount of firepower... should've been enough to blast through a layer of the city's fortified walls!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Don't waste your effort.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Wounds will heal. Flesh will harden. Life will return.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Their weapons cannot hurt my guards. After all, I prepared them especially for you.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Rise, my comrades. Don't let anyone interfere with our conversation.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en, Reunion is attacking us wave after wave! We can't defeat them using conventional methods!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Damn it, do they not feel any pain?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: The other squads are also in the same situation! The Reunion members outside have also started moving. They keep charging towards the headquarters, trying to attack our security facilities!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Prioritize taking care of the enemies in your immediate vicinity!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en, these things have no sense of feeling at all! They've completely surrounded the L.G.D. Headquarters!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: We're being forced into melee combat! We won't be able to support you!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Take care of yourselves.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Majestic, isn't it? After so many battles, their minds seem to have fallen apart, but their bodies are still healthy and strong.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Sheer strength seems to be able to slightly make up for mistakes in decision-making.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: At least we'll have ample time to slowly talk through our issues.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I'd like to have a fruitful discussion with you, Madam, about things that aren't related to this battle.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: There's no need for that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll just kill you right now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're fast!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: But not fast enough.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: She deflected my shot with her blade?
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: That black-haired kid has a good read on my movements.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Tsk... Looks like their plan is to harass me with sniper shots, and then predict my movements while blocking me off.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sorry, Madam. I can pretty much predict all your possible moves. All I need to do is block you off a bit.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: This way, you'll never be able to close the gap. So, which do you prefer? Sharp arrows, explosive bolts, or heavy spikes?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Looks like you really came here prepared.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But when a chessmaster finishes his preparations, he's assuming that his opponent will be playing the other color.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Wait, why is my powder still sticking to her body...?)
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: (So that's what's going on, I see...)
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I'm not good with the theoretical stuff like you, but I simply come prepared for everything.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Your chessboard cannot contain me, brat. I am no chess piece. I am Lungmen's blade.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: The line between bravery and stupidity is fine indeed.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Or were you planning to pull out some kind of trump card? If I remember correctly, I've never seen you use that other sword of yours in combat.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Surely it's not just there for decoration, right?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This sword was not meant to be drawn against the likes of you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You aren't worth of it, no matter what.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: However, you must pay for your sins, for all you've done to the innocent people of Lungmen and Chernobog.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right here, right now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This belongs to you now.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I don't need it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well, just treat it as a loan.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Are you not afraid?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Afraid of what? You turning against me?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, I am not.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Because I am not scared of death.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: This is no ordinary weapon. You'll gradually come to understand it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Do not waste its power on trivial things. A dragonslaying sword shall only be unsheathed against a worthy enemy.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Who you choose to draw this sword upon is entirely up to you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: (...This sword is still hibernating.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (You still refuse to be unsheathed even in this situation...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (But right now, Chi Xiao, you must drink their blood!)
attributes.name: Ch'en
